transformations.headline: Stop Getting Breached. Start Winning.
transformations.aboutIntro: Battle-hardened sales engineer. 20+ years stopping threats. SentinelOne. McAfee. DOW 30 conversions. $50M revenue. Zero excuses.
transformations.experience: 20+ years combat experience. Enterprise security at scale. 500,000+ endpoints. 6 major accounts. 3 DOW 30 conversions. Results matter.
transformations.education: BBA Computer Information Systems. Georgia State. Credentials earned. Now securing enterprises.
transformations.currentRole: Senior Sales Engineer at SentinelOne. November 2021-Present. Winning deals. Protecting organizations.
transformations.previousRole: 16 years at McAfee. SR Enterprise Sales Engineer. Built the foundation. Delivered results.
transformations.approach: Fast. Direct. No fluff. Technical discovery. POC execution. Close deals. Protect infrastructure.

cta.secondary: Ready to fight back? Let's work.

contentPrinciples: Word choice: Active verbs, combat metaphors, power words

exampleContent.serviceDescription: Enterprise security architecture. EDR. XDR. SIEM. Scale up to 500K+ endpoints. No compromises.
exampleContent.achievementStatement: 3 DOW 30 conversions. $50M managed. 500K+ endpoints secured. Highest-attended conference sessions. Results speak.
exampleContent.skillsIntro: 20+ years enterprise security. Cloud infrastructure. AI automation. 1,000+ hours AI development. Technical depth. Business results.

avoidPatterns: Lengthy explanations: 'Let's explore how we might potentially collaborate'
